## Installation

With [cargo add][cargo-add] installed run:

```sh
$ cargo add http-client
```

[cargo-add]: https://github.com/killercup/cargo-edit

## Safety

For non-wasm clients, this crate uses ``#![deny(unsafe_code)]`` to ensure everything is implemented in
100% Safe Rust.
